Interface BurnAndReleaseParams

BurnAndReleaseParams define the parameters for a cross-chain transfer away from Ethereum.

Hierarchy

  • TransferParamsCommon
    • BurnAndReleaseParams

Properties

Optional burnReference

burnReference: string | number
  • Defined in parameters.ts:163

The reference ID of the burn emitted in the contract log.

Optional contractCalls

contractCalls: ContractCall[]
  • Defined in parameters.ts:169

Details for submitting one or more Ethereum transactions. The last one should trigger a burn event in the relevant Gateway contract.

Optional ethereumTxHash

ethereumTxHash: undefined | string
  • Defined in parameters.ts:158

The hash of the burn transaction on Ethereum.

Optional nonce

nonce: undefined | string

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.nonce

  • Defined in parameters.ts:83

An option to override the default nonce generated randomly.

Optional tags

tags: [string]

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.tags

Provide optional tags which can be used to look up transfers in the lightnodes.

Optional txHash

txHash: undefined | string

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.txHash

Provide the transaction hash returned from RenVM to continue a previous mint.

Optional web3Provider

web3Provider: provider

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.web3Provider

  • Defined in parameters.ts:72

A web3 provider must be provided if RenJS is submitting or reading transactions to/from Ethereum.
